meta.title: Courses LTI Tool
platform.clientId.description: After you register an LTI 1.3 Tool with a Platform/LMS (eg, from within Sakai), the Platform usually generates a Client ID for the Tool. Insert that here. If your LMS allows you to configure the Client ID, enter the same value here that you enter there.
platform.cssUrl.description: Lo strumento esegue il rendering dei suoi contenuti in un iframe, quindi lo stile principale viene ignorato. Per definire lo stile dell'output dello strumento, inserisci qui l'URL di un file CSS e l'iframe lo recupererà e lo applicherà in un <link> .
platform.jwksUrl.description: Ensure that this URL is publicly accessible. Unless they are properly configured, some LMSs provide a URL that doesn't account for things like reverse proxies.
platform.noReservesMessage.description: When a course has no current reserves, this message will be displayed.
platform.oidcAuthUrl.description: Ensure that this URL is publicly accessible. Unless they are properly configured, some LMSs provide a URL that doesn't account for things like reverse proxies.
platform.searchUrl.description:
L'URL di ricerca pubblico verrà utilizzato per creare collegamenti quando non è definito alcun accesso elettronico per l'elemento riservato. Alcune variabili possono essere inserite nell'URL, ad esempio, https://find.mylibrary.edu?query=[BARCODE]. Le variabili supportate sono:
  • [BARCODE] - Il barcode dell'item
  • [INSTANCE_HRID] - L'HRID dell'istanza
errors.issuersMustBeUnique: A platform with this issuer already exists. Issuers must be unique.
platform.boxDirectDownload: Transform reserve URLs including "box.com" to direct-download using the Box API
platform.boxDirectDownload.description: When an item has Electronic Access and the URL contains "box.com", the LTI edge module can rewrite the link so that it transparently offers the item for download rather than linking the user to box.com. Note that the edge module must have been launched with a valid Access Token for the Box API, see the documentation for the edge-lti-courses module for more details.
